title.rendered: Chris Grisanti Appears on CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’: Rate Cuts Won’t be Soon

content.rendered:
Chris Grisanti, MAI Capital Management Chief Equity Strategist, joined ‘The Exchange’ to discuss whether the market is ‘too optimistic,’ whether we will see the Fed cutting rates soon, and how to play the rally.

Watch Here

By clicking on the above link, you will leave MAI’s site and will be directed to a third-party site which MAI does not endorse and is not affiliated.  Some third-party sites require registration or subscription to view content.
